Package services

Class StaffService

Object
StaffService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IStaffService
public class StaffService extends Object implements IStaffService
The StaffService class implements the IStaffService interface and provides methods to perform various operations related to staff members.

      public Boolean updateOrderStatus(int orderID)

      Specified by:

      Returns:

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword(User user, String oldPassword, String newPassword) throws AccountNotFoundException, PasswordMismatchException, PasswordValidationException
      Changes the password of a user.
      Specified by:
      changePassword in interface IStaffService
      Parameters:
      user - the user whose password needs to be changed
      oldPassword - the old password
      newPassword - the new password
      Throws:
      AccountNotFoundException - if no account is found with the specified login ID
      PasswordMismatchException - if the old password provided is incorrect
      PasswordValidationException - if the new password is invalid
